verses.verse: O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; for you have <S%H3782>fallen<s%> by your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

<S%H3947>Take<s%> with you <S%H1697>words<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H5375>him<s%>, Take away all <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H3947>receive<s%> us <S%H2896>graciously<s%>: so will we <S%H7999>render<s%> the <S%H6499>calves<s%> of our <S%H8193>lips<s%>.

<S%H804>Asshur<s%> shall not <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H7392>us<s%>; we will not ride upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>: neither will we <S%H559>say<s%> any more to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands<s%>, You are our <S%H430>gods<s%>: for in you the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> finds <S%H7355>mercy<s%>.
I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> their <S%H4878>backsliding<s%>, I will <S%H157>love<s%> them <S%H5071>freely<s%>: for my <S%H639>anger<s%> is turned away from <S%H7725>him<s%>.
I will be as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: he shall <S%H6524>grow<s%> as the <S%H7799>lily<s%>, and cast <S%H5221>forth<s%> his <S%H8328>roots<s%> as <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.
His <S%H3127>branches<s%> shall <S%H3212>spread<s%>, and his <S%H1935>beauty<s%> shall be as the olive <S%H2132>tree<s%>, and his <S%H7381>smell<s%> as <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.

They that <S%H3427>live<s%> under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%>; they shall <S%H2421>revive<s%> as the <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and <S%H6524>grow<s%> as the <S%H1612>vine<s%>: the <S%H2143>scent<s%> there shall be as the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H6091>say<s%>, What have I to do any more with idols? I have <S%H6030>heard<s%> <S%H7789>him<s%>, and observed <S%H7488>him<s%>: I am like a green fir <S%H1265>tree<s%>. From me is your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%>.

Who is <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and he shall <S%H995>understand<s%> these <S%H995>things<s%>? prudent, and he shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1870>them<s%>? for the ways of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H3477>right<s%>, and the <S%H6662>just<s%> shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H6586>them<s%>: but the transgressors shall fall in <S%H3782>it<s%>.
